images.desc: This is what the intersection looks like when facing northward.
This is the door exiting from the Northrop Garage area north.
This is the path you came from if coming from Northrop Garage.
This is the East wall of Northrop garage, it will be on your left.
This is the West wall of Northrop garage, it will be on your right further away.

instructions: Go to Nolte Center Garage. Make your way towards the west-most point.
There should be a door that leads to a short hall with stairs, go left.
Through a door this leads to an intersection (the first picture).
You will be coming from the center path, so you will keep going straight.
This is a long path, you will curve to the let twice (there won't be other paths, just a door labeled to Northrop).
At the end is a door, of which is pictured (the view is if you turn around after going through it).
Going straight from that door and taking a right into where there's a security arm you walk past that, which is pictured if you turned around.
Taking a right from here, you walk straight until you get to Northrop garage, to the left will be a wall with Morrill hall painted on it, and on the opposite Johnston Hall
Enter the door on the Morrill Hall wall and walk up the stairs through another door
Past a hallway on our left you will enter an area of Morill with an elevator on your left.
